tool_description: This API returns the current rates for U.S. Treasury Bonds.
name: Current Treasury Rates
title: Current Treasury Rates

api_list.name: Current Treasury Rates
api_list.description: This API returns the current rates for T-bills and T-bonds.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-treasury-rates.p.rapidapi.com/v1/Rates/Treasury/current"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-treasury-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://current-treasury-rates.p.rapidapi.com/v1/Rates/Treasury/current"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-treasury-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
